public class Triangle
extends java.lang.Object

Defines a triangle in a triangular mesh.

    • barycentricCoordinates

      public int barycentricCoordinates​(javax.vecmath.Vector3d M)
      Parameters:
      M - A vector from an arbitrary point to a point on the plane of the triangle
      Returns:
      0 if point at M lies outside the triangle, 1 if inside, 2 if exactly on an edge
